pr_title: MINOR: Upgrade gradle plugins and test libraries for Java 14 support

timeline.message: MINOR: Upgrade plugins and test libraries for Java 14 support

Replace `AES/GCM/PKCS5Padding` with `AES/GCM/NoPadding`

The former is invalid and JDK 14 rejects it, see
https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8229043.
Skip streams archetype for Java 14 (same as Java 11)
Skip streams archetype for Java 14 (same as Java 11)

timeline.author: mjsax
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,12 +29,17 @@
     --profile --no-daemon --continue -PtestLoggingEvents=started,passed,skipped,failed "$@" \
     || { echo 'Test steps failed'; exit 1; }
 
-# Verify that Kafka Streams archetype compiles
 if [ $JAVA_HOME = "/home/jenkins/tools/java/latest11" ] ; then
   echo "Skipping Kafka Streams archetype test for Java 11"
   exit 0
 fi
 
+if [ $JAVA_HOME = "/home/jenkins/tools/java/latest14" ] ; then
+  echo "Skipping Kafka Streams archetype test for Java 14"
+  exit 0
+fi
